feature_1.title: Instant & Free
feature_1.description: No installation or registration is required. Upload your EPUB and start reading instantly. Our service is completely free, with no ads.

feature_2.title: Privacy First
feature_2.description: We respect your privacy. Your files are processed locally in your browser and are never uploaded to our servers. Your books remain yours.

feature_3.title: Customizable Experience
feature_3.description: Take control of your reading experience. Adjust font size, line height, and choose between single or two-page layouts for your comfort.

feature_4.title: Works on Any Device
feature_4.description: Enjoy a seamless reading experience on any device, from a desktop computer to a tablet or smartphone. Our responsive design adapts to your screen.

feature_5.title: Fast & Efficient
feature_5.description: Built with modern web technologies, our reader offers fast and responsive performance, ensuring your books load quickly and run smoothly.

feature_6.title: Easy Navigation
feature_6.description: Effortlessly navigate through your book using the built-in table of contents or jump directly to any page. Reading should be easy.

why_choose_us_p1: In a world of complex apps and subscriptions, we believe in simplicity. ePub Reader was built with one goal: to provide the easiest, most direct way to read EPUB books online. We remove the barriers between you and your stories.
why_choose_us_p2: Whether you're a student, a professional, or an avid reader, our tool provides a clean, distraction-free interface that puts your content front and center. No pop-ups, no ads, no unnecessary frillsâ€”just you and your book.
why_choose_us_p3: We are committed to an open and accessible platform for everyone. That's why our service is completely free and designed to work on any device with a modern web browser. Join thousands of users who have made online reading simple.
how_it_works_title: How It Works in 3 Simple Steps

how_it_works_steps.step_1: Click 'Upload a Book' and select an EPUB file from your device.
how_it_works_steps.step_2: The book opens instantly in a clean, distraction-free reader.
how_it_works_steps.step_3: Use the menu to customize your reading experience and navigate chapters.

faq_items.a1: Yes, ePub Reader is completely free to use, with no hidden costs or ads. Our goal is to provide a simple, accessible reading tool for everyone.
faq_items.q2: Are my books safe? Are they stored anywhere?
faq_items.a2: Your privacy is our top priority. Your files are never uploaded or stored on any server. Your EPUB file is opened and processed directly within your web browser.
faq_items.q3: What devices can I use this on?
faq_items.a3: Our reader is a web-based application, which means it works on any device with a modern web browser, including desktops (Windows, macOS, Linux), tablets (iPad, Android), and smartphones (iPhone, Android).
